Content: Functions were organized in all Provinces parallel to the national ceremony organized for the opening of 250 school buildings. The Western Province was held at the Prince College in Kotahena under the aegis of Minister Ravi Karunanayake. The opening of the school building of the Chandrika Wewa Jayanthi Maha Vidyalaya of the Sabaragamuwa Province took place under the patronage of United National Party Kolonnawa electoral organizer P. Abeynayake. Meanwhile the Central Province ceremony was held at the Kandy Bathiuideen Mahmud Balika Vidyalaya. It school building was opened by Minister Lakshman Kiriella. Th Northwestern Province function was held at the Puttalam Hindu College under the patronage of Parliamentarian Hector Appuhamy. The Southern Province event was held at the Galle Sudharma Maha Vidyalaya. It took place under the guidance of Minister Vajira Abeywardena. The Northern Province event was held at the Oddusudan Maha Vidyalaya in Mullaitivu. The building was opened by Parliamentarian Shanthini Skandaraja. The Eastern Province function was organized at the Kinniya Meera Nagara Muslim Vidyalaya. It was held under the patronage of Parliamentarian M.S. Fowseek.
